00035 integer abs(const integer& n) {
00036     return (n.sign() < 0 ? -n : n);
00037 }

00045 integer negate(const integer& n) {
00046     integer nn(n);
00047     nn._make_unique();
00048     nn._get_data()->negate();
00049     return nn;
00050 }

00058 integer add(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00059     int sign1=n1.sign(), sign2=n2.sign();
00060     if (sign1 != sign2) {
00061         if (sign1==0) return n2;
00062         else if (sign2==0) return n1;
00063         else return subtract(n1, -n2);
00064     } else {
00065         const data_t *n1data=n1._get_data(), *n2data=n2._get_data();
00066         if (n1data->mLength < n2data->mLength) std::swap(n1data, n2data);
00067 
00068         integer r;
00069         data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00070         rdata->copy(n1data, 1);
00071         rdata->add(*n2data);
00072         return r;
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00082 integer subtract(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00083     int sign1=n1.sign(), sign2=n2.sign();
00084     if (sign1 != sign2) {
00085         if (sign1 == 0) return -n2;
00086         else if (sign2 == 0) return n1;
00087         else return add(n1, -n2);
00088     } else {
00089         bool invert=(sign1 == (n1 < n2 ? 1 : -1));
00090         const data_t *n1data=n1._get_data(), *n2data=n2._get_data();
00091         if (invert) std::swap(n1data, n2data);
00092 
00093         integer r;
00094         data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00095         rdata->copy(n1data);
00096         rdata->subtract(*n2data);
00097         return (invert ? -r : r);
00098     }
00099 }

00111 integer multiply(const integer& n, const integer& by) {
00112     int nsign=n.sign(), bysign=by.sign();
00113     if (nsign==0 || bysign==0) return integer::zero();
00114 
00115     const data_t *ndata=n._get_data(), *bydata=by._get_data();
00116     if (ndata == bydata) return sqr(n);
00117 
00118     // In multiplication, we know that the answer will be less than or equal to
00119     // the sum of the lengths of the operands.
00120     integer answer;
00121     data_t *answerdata=answer._get_data();
00122     answerdata->alloc(ndata->mLength + bydata->mLength);
00123 
00124     // Now multiply the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00125     const digit_t *d1 = ndata->digits, *d1e = d1 + ndata->mLength;
00126     const digit_t *d2e = bydata->digits + bydata->mLength;
00127     for (int digit1=0; d1<d1e; ++digit1, ++d1) {
00128         const digit_t *d2=bydata->digits;
00129         for (int digit2=0; d2<d2e; ++digit2, ++d2) {
00130             // First multiply the two digits
00131             doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(*d1) * *d2;
00132 
00133             // Now add the result to the answer.
00134             int carry=0;
00135             digit_t *a = answerdata->digits + digit1 + digit2;
00136             doubledigit_t addt=doubledigit_t(*a) + (t & digit_mask);
00137             if (addt >= digit_overflowbit) carry=1;
00138             *a++=static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00139 
00140             addt=*a + ((t >> bits_per_digit) & digit_mask) + carry;
00141             if (addt >= digit_overflowbit) carry=1; else carry=0;
00142             *a++=static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00143 
00144             while (carry) {
00145                 addt=*a+1;
00146                 *a++ = static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00147                 if (addt < digit_overflowbit) break;
00148             }
00149         }
00150     }
00151 
00152     answer._set_negative(nsign != bysign);
00153     answer._get_data()->skipLeadingZeros();
00154     return answer;
00155 }

00159 std::pair<integer, integer> divideBySingleDigit(const integer& d1, digit_t d2) {
00160     const data_t *d1data=d1._get_data();
00161 
00162     integer quotient, remainder;
00163     data_t *qdata=quotient._get_data(), *rdata=remainder._get_data();
00164     qdata->alloc(d1data->mLength);
00165     rdata->alloc(1);
00166 
00167     doubledigit_t a=0;
00168     const doubledigit_t lomask(digit_mask);
00169     const doubledigit_t himask(doubledigit_t(digit_mask) << bits_per_digit);
00170 
00171     int m = int(d1data->mLength) - 1;
00172     const digit_t *d1p=d1data->digits+m;
00173     digit_t *qp=qdata->digits+m;
00174     for (int i = m; i >= 0; --i, --d1p, --qp) {
00175         a = (a & ~lomask) | *d1p;
00176         *qp = static_cast<digit_t>(a / d2);
00177         a = (a & ~himask) | ((a % d2) << bits_per_digit);
00178     }
00179     rdata->digits[0] = static_cast<digit_t>((a & himask) >>
00180         bits_per_digit);
00181 
00182     qdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00183     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00184     return std::make_pair(quotient, remainder);
00185 }
00186 
00187 std::pair<integer, integer> subDivide(integer d1, integer d2) {
00188     const digit_t *byDigits = d2._get_data()->digits;
00189 
00190     // The normalization step
00191     digit_t d = static_cast<digit_t>(digit_overflowbit /
00192         (doubledigit_t(byDigits[d2._get_length()-1])+1));
00193     if (d > 1) {
00194         d1 *= d;
00195         d2 *= d;
00196 
00197         // Gotta reset this
00198         byDigits = d2._get_data()->digits;
00199     }
00200     assert(d2._get_digit(d2._get_length()-1) >= digit_overflowbit / 2);
00201 
00202     integer quotient, r(d1);
00203     data_t *qdata=quotient._get_data();
00204 
00205     size_t n=d2._get_length(), m=d1._get_length() - n;
00206     size_t i=m+n, j=m;
00207     qdata->alloc(j+1);
00208 
00209     r._make_unique();
00210     do {
00211         doubledigit_t ri=(doubledigit_t(r._get_digit(i, true))
00212             << bits_per_digit) + r._get_digit(i-1, true);
00213         doubledigit_t q=(std::min<doubledigit_t>)(ri / byDigits[n-1], digit_mask);
00214 
00215         while (1) {
00216             // We need three digits here, a doubledigit_t won't suffice.
00217             doubledigit_t r2a=ri - (q * byDigits[n-1]);
00218             integer r2=(integer(r2a) << bits_per_digit) + r._get_digit(i-2);
00219             if (byDigits[n-2] * q <= r2) break;
00220             --q;
00221         }
00222 
00223         integer bq=d2*q;
00224         if (r < bq) { --q; bq -= d2; }
00225 
00226         integer rtemp((r >> (bits_per_digit * (i-n))) - bq);
00227         data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00228 
00229         digit_t *rdigits=rdata->digits;
00230 
00231         for (size_t x=0; x<=n && i-n+x < rdata->mLength; ++x)
00232             rdigits[i-n+x]=rtemp._get_digit(x, true);
00233         rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00234 
00235         qdata->digits[j--]=digit_t(q);
00236     } while (--i >= n);
00237 
00238     qdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00239 
00240     if (d > 1) {
00241         // Denormalization step. This requires a division by a single digit_t.
00242         integer remainder=divideBySingleDigit(r, d).first;
00243         return std::make_pair(quotient, remainder);
00244     } else {
00245         return std::make_pair(quotient, r);
00246     }
00247 }

00259 integer divide(const integer& dividend, const integer& divisor) {
00260     return divide_r(dividend, divisor).first;
00261 }
00262 
00274 std::pair<integer, integer> divide_r(const integer& d1, const integer& d2) {
00275     int sign1=d1.sign(), sign2=d2.sign();
00276     if (sign2==0) throw divide_by_zero();
00277 
00278     int comp=compare(d1, d2, true);
00279     if (comp<0) {
00280         return std::make_pair(integer::zero(), d1);
00281     } else if (comp==0) {
00282         return std::make_pair(sign1 != sign2 ? integer::one() : integer(-1),
00283             integer::zero());
00284     }
00285 
00286     if (sign1 < 0 && sign2 < 0) {
00287         std::pair<integer, integer> a=subDivide(-d1, -d2);
00288         a.second._set_negative(true);
00289         return a;
00290     } else if (sign1 < 0) {
00291         std::pair<integer, integer> a=subDivide(-d1, d2);
00292         a.first._set_negative(true);
00293         a.second._set_negative(true);
00294         return a;
00295     } else if (sign2 < 0) {
00296         std::pair<integer, integer> a=subDivide(d1, -d2);
00297         a.first._set_negative(true);
00298         return a;
00299     };
00300 
00301     if (d2._get_data()->mLength == 1) {
00302         return divideBySingleDigit(d1, d2._get_data()->digits[0]);
00303     } else {
00304         return subDivide(d1, d2);
00305     }
00306 }
